entry.title: About The Netherlands
entry.content:
I like the Netherlands, so I‚Äôm going to collect some notes about it.

Basic Infoüîó

  • Language: Dutch
  • Population: 17.5 million

  • Currency: Euro
  • Time Zone: CET (UTC+1)
  • Dial Code: +31
  • Drive: The right side of the roads

Videosüîó

    • Dutch are the tallest people onaverage in the world. Men: 185cm, Women: 170cm
